about_the_game:
YOUR DECISION, YOUR ENDING

Embark on an adventure where your choices shape the outcome. Will you lead Lily and Jake to triumph, or will their journey meet a darker fate? The decisions you make will determine their ultimate destiny.

SOLVE RIDDLES AND UNVEIL MYSTERIES

Delve into the depths of the palm houses, where hidden clues and cryptic messages await your discovery. Only by solving these riddles can you uncover the truth behind Sinclair's nefarious schemes. Piece together the fragments of the puzzle, utilizing your wit and intellect to decipher the secrets that lie within. But beware, for not all mysteries are meant to be solved easily. Some may require sacrifices, while others may lead you down dangerous paths. Will you have the tenacity to unravel the enigma, or will you fall prey to the machinations of those who seek to keep their secrets buried?

ENCHANTING CITY ATMOSPHERE

Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Miami Beach, where every corner holds secrets and every encounter is filled with intrigue. Let the enchanting city atmosphere draw you deeper into the heart of the mystery. From the bustling streets to the opulent palm houses, experience the pulse of the city as it beckons you to uncover its hidden truths. But amidst the glitz and glamour lies a darkness that threatens to consume all who dare to venture too far. Can you navigate through the dazzling facade to reveal the darkness lurking beneath, or will you be seduced by the allure of the city's illusions?
Will you be the hero who brings justice to Miami Beach, or will you succumb to the shadows? The fate of Lily, Jake, and the entire city rests in your hands. Choose wisely, for the pursuit of truth may lead you down unexpected paths.

content_descriptors.notes: Buyers should be aware that this game contains adult content, including episodic scenes of a sexual nature, crime scenes, and battles without graphic violence. Please ensure that you are comfortable with this type of content before purchasing the game. It is recommended for mature audiences only, and players should be prepared for content appropriate for this category.
